biotools.summary: Takes a GenomeDiff file and removes all of the entries that are NOT used as evidence by a mutation. Outputs to a new GenomeDiff file if specified. If no output is specified, verbose will still inform what evidence isn't being used.

bioschemas.name: gdtools_not-evidence
bioschemas.summary: Takes a GenomeDiff file and removes all of the entries that are NOT used as evidence by a mutation. Outputs to a new GenomeDiff file if specified. If no output is specified, verbose will still inform what evidence isn't being used.
